name: Pink Onion
author: Gino R.
description: Great find!  We had an amazing dinner. We had the magic mushroom and the schiacciata pizzas. They were both great. Husband and wife team Matt and Nigeli (sp?) provided exceptional service.  I witnessed 2 times where matt went above and beyond. His ultimate goal is complete customer satisfaction. We had a substitution for one of our pizzas and they missed one ingredient. Our table was fine with the omission but Matt insisted on getting it right and brought over another pizza.  Delicious food with great service. We will definitely be going back!!
